Posts.Content: alison0328 wrote: Hi everyone.  I'm new here and am posting after my OBGYN appt today.  I was seen for a breast mass that I discovered a few weeks ago.  I waited to make an appt to make sure it wasn't cycle related.  My "lumps" are in the upper breast but are more of a thickening and then I have an actual hard lump just below my nipple.  The breast has also grown in size, which was noticed by the Dr. before I said anything about it.  Anyway....has anyone had any experience with 3D mammos?  Dr. just said they can see a lot more with 3D vs. 2D.  I feel like she was concerned with the large thickened area the most.  Thanks in advance. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Being sent for 3D Mammogram & Ultrasound alison0328 Tazzy
